name: Frame One
description:
Frame One

A fighting game where move effects happen on the first frame of a button's press and release.

The objective is to knock your opponent out until they lose all of their hearts.

You can lose hearts when you lose all of your health or if you get knocked off the edge of the stage.

* This is a work in progress demo. We are looking for feedback to further shape the game's future.

Character Select Controls:

Keyboard:

        Start Match: Enter

        Quit Game: Escape

        Dropout: K

        Change Character: J

        Change Color: A D

Xbox:

        Start Match: Start

        Quit Game: Select

        Dropout: B

        Change Character: X

        Change Color: Left Stick

Fight Controls:

Keyboard (Not recommended):

        Move: A D

        Fast fall: S in Air

        Jump: Space

        Attack 1: J

        Attack 2: K

        Attack 3: L

        Mobility: ;

        Mobility Direction: H B N M

        Pause: Enter

        Quit: Pause, then Attack 2

Xbox:

        Move: Left stick

        Fast fall: Left stick down in air

        Jump: A

        Attack 1: X

        Attack 2: B

        Attack 3: Y

        Mobility: RB

        Mobility Direction: Right stick

        Pause: Start

        Quit: Pause, then Attack 2

Sounds source:

We got our BGM from FesliyanStudios

Song Names:

- Peaceful Koi Pond

- Modern Samurai

- A Geishas Lament
